DOC.brief_summary: Assessment VATS versus standard open surgery treatment non small cell lung cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Video Assisted Thoracoscopic Surgery ( VATS ) Versus Open Surgery Patients Undergoing Lobectomy
DOC.criteria: Subject must 18 year age old . Subject must clinically diagnosed stage I stage IIA non small cell lung cancer measure judge resectable . Subject must able tolerate general anesthesia , cardiopulmonary reserve tolerate lobectomy Subject pregnant ( documented pregnancy test ) breastfeeding . Subject severe illness would preclude surgery Unstable angina Myocardial Infarction within 3 month Coronary Artery Bypass Graft Surgery Subject active cancer Subject unable comply follow : Study requirement Give valid informed consent Followup schedule
